variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 1.50% on the portion of income up to $8,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 3.20% on the portion of income over $8,000 up to $25,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 4.30% on the portion of income over $25,000 up to $50,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 4.70% on the portion of income over $50,000 up to $100,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 4.90% on the portion of income over $100,000 up to $315,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 5.90% on the portion of income over $315,000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_6 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all six brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
